content:
Hey all!
This is my first time trying to contribute to RA, and I've been looking into https://github.com/rust-analyzer/rust-analyzer/issues/11499 and it looks pretty doable so far. I read the contributing doc, but it didn't really say anything about whether I should comment on the issue that I'll be working on it or anything, so I thought I'd just drop in here and let you guys know :)
